00010 #include <stddef.h>
00011 #include "general.h"

00013 typedef struct list_node_struct
00014 {
00015     struct list_node_struct *prev;
00016     struct list_node_struct *next;
00017     void                    *data;
00018 } list_node_;
00019 
00020 EXTERN_TYPE(list_node);
00021 EXTERN_TYPE(list);
00022 CONST_TYPE(list, const_list);
00023 
00024 #define   list_new(type)       list_new_aux(sizeof(type))
00025 #define   list_delete(l)       list_delete_aux(&(l))
00026 
00027 list_node list_begin(list l);
00028 list_node list_end(list l);
00029 list_node list_rbegin(list l);
00030 list_node list_rend(list l);
00031 
00032 boolean   list_empty(const list l);
00033 size_t    list_size(const list l);
00034 size_t    list_max_size(const_list l);
00035 void      list_resize(list l, size_t sz);
00036 
00037 #define   list_front(l,x)      list_front_aux(l, (void*) &(x))
00038 #define   list_back(l,x)       list_back_aux(l, (void*) &(x))
00039 
00040 #define   list_push_front(l,x) list_push_front_aux(l, (void*) (x))
00041 void      list_pop_front(list l);
00042 #define   list_push_back(l,x)  list_push_back_aux(l, (void*) (x))
00043 void      list_pop_back(list l);
00044 
00045 #define   list_insert(l,position,x)     list_insert_aux(l, position, (void*) (x))
00046 #define   list_insert_n(l,position,n,x) list_insert_n_aux(l, position, n, (void*) (x))
00047 
00048 list_node list_erase(list l, list_node node);
00049 list_node list_erase_range(list l, list_node b, list_node e);
00050 void      list_swap(list x, list y);
00051 void      list_clear(list l);
00052 void      list_splice(list l, list_node position, list_node b, list_node e);
00053 #define   list_remove(l,x)     list_remove_aux(l, (void*) (x))
00054 /* FIXME: stl standard has a method remove_if(), I haven't support it till now. */
00055 
00056 void      list_unique(list l);
00057 /* FIXME: stl standard has a method with predicate unique(), but I have no. */
00058 void      list_merge(list dest, list src);
00059 /* FIXME: stl standard has a method with comp merge(), but I have no. */
00060 void      list_sort(list l);
00061 /* FIXME: stl standard has a method with comp sort(), but I have no. */
